entry.title: River Island Elastic Tennesee Bustier Top
entry.summary:
Vendor: River Island
Type: Beachwear
Price: 16.00

River Island brings us an eclectic collection of fashion forward styles. Look out for vibrantly printed party dresses, feminine detailing, statement jackets and a covetable range of denim including skinny cut jeans and cute denim shorts, which sits alongside their directional footwear and swimwear range.

entry.title: We Are Handsome The Mighty Scoop One Piece
entry.summary:
Vendor: We Are Handsome
Type: Beachwear
Price: 213.00

Born in Summer 2009, We Are Handsome is the embodiment of co-designers Indhra and Jeremy's love of the finer things in life. A sun drenched colour palette and bold landscape prints see We Are Handsome recalling the halcyon days of a childhood spent in Queensland, with every bikini and swimsuit 100% Australian designed and sewn.

entry.title: Seafolly Miami High Neck Swimsuit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Seafolly
Type: Beachwear
Price: 90.00

Effortlessly encapsulating the laid-back Australian beach lifestyle through their swimwear collections, Seafolly are renowned for bold colours and innovative bikinis and one pieces. Priding themselves on high quality design and fabrication, Seafolly's eclectic textures and statement prints bring forth the label's philosophy. Bandeau bikini tops and skirted briefs complement their sophisticated range of swimsuits adorned with pleating and soft frills, as beach cover-ups complete the capsule collection.

entry.title: Talulah Memories Swimsuit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Talulah
Type: Beachwear
Price: 94.00

Designer Kelli Whartonâ€™s label Talulah has shore style sewn up since launching its swimwear line in 2013. With a soaking of Aussie sunshine and visions of boho vacations, Talulah splash floral prints, tassels and beaded embellishments across their selection of silk kaftans, triangle bikinis, printed sarongs and one-pieces.

entry.title: Ginja By Baku Cairo Paisley Print Flounce Bikini Top
entry.summary:
Vendor: Baku
Type: Beachwear
Price: 64.00

Australian swimwear leaders Baku have become synonymous with sleek separates and perfect fits. With an edit of bikinis and one-piece swimsuits in innovative designs and exclusive prints, Baku bring forth beach confidence through flattering cuts and bold colour palettes. Botanical blooms and block-colours set the tone, as ruffle trims and bandeau styles keep it feminine.

entry.title: Your Oyster - Blue
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wall Art
Type: Posters
Price: 18.00

'The World is Your Oyster', in other words you have the ability and the freedom to do exactly what you want!

A lovely phrase printed with blue ink on cool blue paper.

The perfect print for a child's bedroom!

entry.title: You Look Lovely
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wall Art
Type: Posters
Price: 14.00

The perfect print to brighten up anybody's day. Give this to your best friend, a relative, or your sweetheart and you will surely make them smile!

This sweet design has been screen printed by hand onto a quality thick recycled card. This lovely flecked light brown card is rigid enough to prop up on display without the need for a frame!

entry.title: Whiter Shade of Pale gold-plated Swarovski crystal earrings
entry.summary:
Vendor: Adidas
Type: Accessories
Price: 485.00

Adored by A-listers such as Kate Moss and Angelina Jolie, cult jeweler Erickson Beamon is our go-to for statement sparkle. We love these handmade mid-weight gold-plated earrings, glittering with clear and opalescent Swarovski crystals. For pierced ears.

entry.title: Washed-twill drawstring shorts
entry.summary:
Vendor: Adidas
Type: Shorts
Price: 90.00

Splendid's lightweight washed-twill shorts are perfect for summer. This breezy pair has an elasticated waist for comfort. Wear yours with simple tanks and sweaters.

entry.title: Walk That Walk crocheted cotton-blend bikini
entry.summary:
Vendor: Adidas
Type: Beachwear
Price: 145.00

Based in Bondi Beach, Lisa Maree is a swimwear expert. This pretty crocheted halterneck bikini has been crafted by hand. Offset the sky-blue and white hues with gold accessories.

entry.title: Vacationland printed silk shorts
entry.summary:
Vendor: Adidas
Type: Shorts
Price: 170.00

J.Crew's pink shorts are playfully illustrated with palm trees, yachts and sunbathers. Evoking images of long summer days, this lightweight silk pair is perfect for your next vacation. The elasticated waistband ensures a comfortable fit.

entry.title: Tsovet Leather Watch
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tsovet
Type: Watches
Price: 300.00

Leather strap watch by Tsovet. Featuring a round bezel with a stainless steel case, a textured crown to the 3 o'clock position, a round face with notched numerical indexes, logo detailing to the centre, triple hand Swiss quartz movement, a smooth leather strap with exposed stitched seams and a secure pin buckle fastening. Presented in a branded box.

entry.title: Tsovet Brown Leather Watch
entry.summary:
Vendor: Tsovet
Type: Watches
Price: 250.00

Analogue watch by Tsovet. Constructed in matte stainless steel with an Italian calf leather strap. Featuring a large logo embossed round dial with contrast indices, a luminous fill three hand quartz analogue movement and scratch resistant toughened glass, a slim bezel, a raised textured crown, a leather strap with natural stitching and a pin buckle closure, includes a presentation case.

entry.title: The Poetic License cutout crocheted cotton-blend swimsuit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Adidas
Type: Beachwear
Price: 140.00

Opt for a bold beachwear look in Lisa Maree's black crocheted swimsuit. Featuring padded cups, intricate paneling and a cutout back, this figure-hugging design is an eye-catching alternative to a two-piece.

entry.title: The Man
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wall Art
Type: Posters
Price: 35.00

Whoever the man is in your case 'stick it' to them with this fantastic new print from James Brown.

Produced by hand in James' East London studio using traditional linocut printing.

Please note: Each linocut print has been produced by hand making each print unique. Some prints may appear darker than the image above and others may appear slightly more patchy.

entry.title: Textured faux leather iPhone 5 case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Adidas
Type: Accessories
Price: 130.00

Give your everyday look a pop of color with MICHAEL Michael Kors' textured faux leather iPhone 5 case. Constructed with a detachable shoulder strap, this handy design has internal pockets to hold small essentials like keys and cards.

entry.title: Stretch-silk crepe de chine shorts
entry.summary:
Vendor: Adidas
Type: Shorts
Price: 137.00

Sporty, laid-back pieces are a must-have this season, so work DKNY's stretch-silk crepe de chine shorts 24/7. Finished with a fully adjustable drawstring waist, this breezy pair can easily be dressed up with a tucked-in shirt and metallic pumps.

entry.title: Stars - Silver
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wall Art
Type: Posters
Price: 90.00

The lettering that Seb has developed for this piece is made up of hundreds of thousands of tiny stars, each glistening in metallic silver. To see the stars up close and from further angles please scroll through the additional images above.

This is the third and final Stars edition from Seb Lester.

The black Plike paper compliments the metallic silver print perfectly.
